title: Controlling and Manipulative Men: How To Spot Them, Deal With Th
description:
Controlling and Manipulative Men: How To Spot Them, Deal With Them And Avoid Them



Does your man lie to you to protect or gain something for himself? Does your man make you give up things you like to make HIM happy? Does he try to control your every move? Does he tell you who you can and cannot talk to? Does he make you feel guilty or blame you for his problems? Has he isolated you from friends and family, leaving you with a virtually non-existent social life? If you answered â€œyesâ€ to any of these questions, youâ€™re in a relationship with a manipulative and controlling man. How did you allow yourself to get into a situation like this in the first place? If you are presently in a relationship with a controlling and manipulative man what do you do? Do you stay? Or do you leave? 

In her book entitled Controlling and Manipulative Men: How To Spot Them, Deal With Them And Avoid Them author Janice Presser who was once in the clutches of a manipulative and controlling man answers these and other questions and gives you a thorough and detailed analysis of men who feel the need to control and manipulate women. 

In this book, you will learn about: 

â€¢ Manipulation. 
â€¢ Why manipulation is considered abuse. 
â€¢ The signs you should look for if you are unsure whether or not your man is manipulative and controlling. 
â€¢ What it is that makes a manipulative, controlling man so successful at manipulating YOU. 
â€¢ How to handle manipulative men. 
â€¢ How to decide whether or not to stay with your manipulative man or leave him. 
â€¢ If you do decide to leave your manipulative man, this book will give you valuable information about how to get away quickly and safely. 
â€¢ Finally, you will learn that it is impossible to avoid manipulative men but it is possible to protect yourself from becoming a victim of a manipulative, controlling man
